ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Looking for somewhere to go
ygData.msgSnippet: I play on Veeshan also, it can get busy at times but me being from England I get to play when the servers are under populated (1200-1400 ppl). I know what you
ygData.messageBody:
I play on Veeshan also, it can get busy at times but me being from England
I get to play when the servers are under populated (1200-1400 ppl). I know
what you mean about experience though, I have only recently got through 40
(took me 3 weeks). An excellent place for exp at your level would be Dwarf
NPC's in Butcherblock, you only loose faction with the residents and not
guards. If you can get a 2 spawn dwarf camp you can sit there for hours
Charming them and then killing the winner using Fear/snare (or Kiting). The
spawns are 12 minutes usually but they are great exp. Also solo'ing giants
is another good option.

If not you could try Mistmoore, if you can get a group from your guild to
take you there and simply powerlevel you I can assure you that you will get
through 35 in a day. I made 1.5 bubs of level 35 exp in 3 hours and I was
grouped with level 45+ people.

you will get there, don't worry about it.




"Kevin L. Crawford" <Lyrnia@...> on 22/03/2000 15:20:19

Please respond to eqbards@onelist.com

To: eqbards@onelist.com
cc: (bcc: John Senior/M&G)
Subject: [eqbards] Looking for somewhere to go




From: "Kevin L. Crawford" <Lyrnia@...>

Looking for fun and adventure at level 35 on Veeshan....
Please don't say Guk. I can walk from live side tower to dead side tower
and not run into a single NPC in lower guk on veeshan. The server is THAT
crowded. Almost 50%+ of the players are 35+ now (server REALLY needs to be
split). Soldung B is the same. Asside from doing FG's or Efreet with my
guild there's no point in even visiting those two dungeons unless I'm after
a specific item. (No problem getting in a group, but XP is another
question entirely).

I hunted in Kithicor last night, that was fun. I'd LOVE to get a group
together to do PAW but I rarely have time to get into an organized group.

Anyway, advice welcome. I made it to 50 on Test BEFORE there was ever more
than 300 people online at a time. Test was pristine back then. On Veeshan
I have a hard time levelling just because I can't find anything to kill.
Everything is camped to high heaven. Even giants are hard to find these
days.

Ungh!

1800-2200 players online. 60-70% are hunting the high level areas....
**sighs**

And people wonder why I spend most of my time in Asheron's Call now.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
